Speaker: You
Text: Frank. I know you had little to nothing to do with this project.

Speaker: Frank
Text: Ho-How could you say that sir?

Speaker: You
Text: Direction is not the same as execution| you have to credit Olivia and Wilson.

Speaker: Frank
Text: What are you saying? That I should give all the credit to them?

Speaker: You
Text: Not at all… I'm giving you a chance to re-write the report and do it fairly this time.

Speaker: Frank
Text: Fine. But this is just how the industry is.

Speaker: You
Text: This industry is also built upon integrity and respect| something you seem to still need to learn.
